title: Port Discovery
description:
Analyze this nmap scan output. How many TCP ports are in the OPEN state?

PORT      STATE    SERVICE        VERSION
22/tcp    open     ssh            OpenSSH 8.9p1
80/tcp    open     http           Apache httpd 2.4.52
443/tcp   open     https          Apache httpd 2.4.52
3306/tcp  closed   mysql
5432/tcp  filtered postgresql
8080/tcp  open     http-proxy     Squid 5.2
8443/tcp  filtered https-alt

Submit as: flag{number}
hints: 'closed' means the port responded but no service is listening
'filtered' means a firewall blocked the probe â€” neither counts as open
